author: dcspark
title: Milkomeda DAO Hackathon
description: Many Cardano users don't realize they can launch their DAO on Milkomeda using mature tooling
solution: We will host a virtual hackathon for individuals & companies that want to start a DAO and share our knowledge about Cardano & Ethereum
experience: Our team is composed of well known ex-Emurgo and ex-IOHK employees who have been building the Cardano ecosystem for the past several years
